020import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.TNEDialect;
021import org.intellij.lang.annotations.Language;
022
023/**
024 * MySQLRevampDialect
025 *
026 * @author creatorfromhell
027 * @since 0.1.2.0
028 *
029 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_accounts (
030 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
031 *     username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
032 *     account_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
033 *     created DATETIME NOT NULL,
034 *     pin VARCHAR(16),
035 *     status VARCHAR(36)
036 * );
037 *
038 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_non_players_accounts (
039 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
040 *     owner VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL
041 * );
042 *
043 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_players_accounts (
044 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
045 *     last_online DATETIME NOT NULL
046 * );
047 *
048 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_account_members (
049 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
050 *     account VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
051 *     perm VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
052 *     perm_value TINYINT(1) NOT NULL
053 * );
054 *
055 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_holdings (
056 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
057 *     server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
058 *     region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
059 *     currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
060 *     holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
061 *     holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,
062 *     PRIMARY KEY(uid, server, region, currency, holdings_type)
063 * );
064 *
065 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_receipts (
066 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
067 *     performed DATETIME NOT NULL,
068 *     receipt_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
069 *     receipt_source VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,
070 *     receipt_source_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
071 *     archive TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,
072 *     voided TINYINT(1) NOT NULL
073 * );
074 *
075 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_receipts_holdings (
076 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
077 *     participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
078 *     ending TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,
079 *     server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
080 *     region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
081 *     currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
082 *     holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
083 *     holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,
084 *     PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)
085 * );
086 *
087 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_receipts_participants (
088 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
089 *     participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
090 *     participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
091 *     tax DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,
092 *     PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)
093 * );
094 *
095 * CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prefix_receipts_modifiers (
096 *     uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
097 *     participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
098 *     participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
099 *     operation VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
100 *     region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
101 *     currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
102 *     modifier DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,
103 *     PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)
104 * );
105 */
106public class MySQLRevampDialect implements TNEDialect {
107
108  public static final String requirement = "3.5.0";
109
110  //The load and save queries
111  @Language("SQL")
112  protected final String saveName;
113
114  @Language("SQL")
115  protected final String loadAccounts;
116
117  @Language("SQL")
118  protected final String loadAccount;
119
120  @Language("SQL")
121  protected final String saveAccount;
122
123  @Language("SQL")
124  protected final String loadNonPlayer;
125
126  @Language("SQL")
127  protected final String saveNonPlayer;
128
129  @Language("SQL")
130  protected final String loadPlayer;
131
132  @Language("SQL")
133  protected final String savePlayer;
134
135  @Language("SQL")
136  protected final String loadMembers;
137
138  @Language("SQL")
139  protected final String saveMember;
140
141  @Language("SQL")
142  protected final String loadHoldings;
143
144  @Language("SQL")
145  protected final String saveHolding;
146
147  @Language("SQL")
148  protected final String loadReceipts;
149
150  @Language("SQL")
151  protected final String saveReceipt;
152
153  @Language("SQL")
154  protected final String loadReceiptHolding;
155
156  @Language("SQL")
157  protected final String saveReceiptHolding;
158
159  @Language("SQL")
160  protected final String loadParticipants;
161
162  @Language("SQL")
163  protected final String saveParticipant;
164
165  @Language("SQL")
166  protected final String loadModifiers;
167
168  @Language("SQL")
169  protected final String saveModifier;
170
171  protected final String prefix;
172
173  public MySQLRevampDialect(final String prefix) {
174
175    this.prefix = prefix;
176
177    this.saveName = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "player_names (uid, username) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = ?";
178
179    this.loadAccounts = "SELECT uid AS uid, username, account_type, created, pin, status FROM " + prefix + "accounts";
180
181    this.loadAccount = "SELECT username, account_type, created, pin, status FROM " + prefix + "accounts WHERE uid = ?";
182
183    this.saveAccount = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "accounts (uid, username, account_type, created, pin, status)" +
184                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = ?, pin = ?, status = ?";
185
186    this.loadNonPlayer = "SELECT owner AS owner FROM " + prefix + "non_players_accounts WHERE uid = ?";
187
188    this.saveNonPlayer = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "non_players_accounts (uid, owner) VALUES (?, ?) " +
189                         "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE owner = ?";
190
191    this.loadPlayer = "SELECT last_online FROM " + prefix + "players_accounts WHERE uid = ?";
192
193    this.savePlayer = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "players_accounts (uid, last_online) VALUES (?, ?) " +
194                      "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_online = ?";
195
196    this.loadMembers = "SELECT uid AS uid, perm, perm_value FROM " + prefix + "account_members WHERE account = ?";
197
198    this.saveMember = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "account_members (uid, account, perm, perm_value) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) " +
199                      "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE perm_value = ?";
200
201    this.loadHoldings = "SELECT region, currency AS currency, holdings_type, holdings FROM " + prefix +
202                        "holdings WHERE uid = ? AND server = ?";
203
204    this.saveHolding = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "holdings (uid, server, region, currency, holdings_type, holdings) " +
205                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE holdings = ?";
206
207    this.loadReceipts = "SELECT uid AS uid, performed, receipt_type, receipt_source, receipt_source_type, archive, voided FROM " +
208                        prefix + "receipts";
209
210    this.saveReceipt = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts (uid, performed, receipt_type, receipt_source, " +
211                       "receipt_source_type, archive, voided) " +
212                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE archive = ?, voided = ?";
213
214    this.loadReceiptHolding = "SELECT participant AS participant, ending, server, region, " +
215                              "currency AS currency, holdings_type, holdings FROM " +
216                              prefix + "receipts_holdings WHERE uid = ? AND participant = ? AND ending = ?";
217
218    this.saveReceiptHolding = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_holdings (uid, participant, ending, " +
219                              "server, region, currency, holdings_type, holdings) " +
220                              "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid=uid";
221
222    this.loadParticipants = "SELECT participant AS participant, participant_type, tax FROM " +
223                            prefix + "receipts_participants WHERE uid = ?";
224
225    this.saveParticipant = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_participants (uid, participant, participant_type, tax) " +
226                           "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid=uid";
227
228    this.loadModifiers = "SELECT participant AS participant, participant_type, operation, region, " +
229                         "currency AS currency, modifier FROM " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers WHERE uid = ? AND participant = ? AND participant_type = ?";
230
231    this.saveModifier = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers (uid, participant, participant_type, operation, region, currency, modifier) " +
232                        "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid = uid";
233
234  }
235
236  @Override
237  public String accountsTable() {
238    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "accounts (\n" +
239           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
240           "    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
241           "    account_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
242           "    created DATETIME NOT NULL,\n" +
243           "    pin VARCHAR(16),\n" +
244           "    status VARCHAR(36)\n" +
245           ");";
246  }
247
248  @Override
249  public String accountsNonPlayerTable() {
250    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "non_players_accounts (\n" +
251           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
252           "    owner VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL\n" +
253           ");";
254  }
255
256  @Override
257  public String accountsPlayerTable() {
258    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "players_accounts (\n" +
259           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
260           "    last_online DATETIME NOT NULL\n" +
261           ");";
262  }
263
264  @Override
265  public String accountMembersTable() {
266    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "account_members (\n" +
267           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
268           "    account VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
269           "    perm VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
270           "    perm_value TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
271           "    PRIMARY KEY(uid, account, perm)\n" +
272           ");";
273  }
274
275  @Override
276  public String holdingsTable() {
277    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "holdings (\n" +
278           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
279           "    server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
280           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
281           "    currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
282           "    holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
283           "    holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
284           "    PRIMARY KEY(uid, server, region, currency, holdings_type)\n" +
285           ");";
286  }
287
288  @Override
289  public String receiptsTable() {
290    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts (\n" +
291           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
292           "    performed DATETIME NOT NULL,\n" +
293           "    receipt_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
294           "    receipt_source VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,\n" +
295           "    receipt_source_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
296           "    archive TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
297           "    voided TINYINT(1) NOT NULL\n" +
298           ");";
299  }
300
301  @Override
302  public String receiptsHoldingsTable() {
303    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_holdings (\n" +
304           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
305           "    participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
306           "    ending TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
307           "    server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
308           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
309           "    currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
310           "    holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
311           "    holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
312           "    PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)\n" +
313           ");";
314  }
315
316  @Override
317  public String receiptsParticipantsTable() {
318    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_participants (\n" +
319           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
320           "    participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
321           "    participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
322           "    tax DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
323           "    PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)\n" +
324           ");";
325  }
326
327  @Override
328  public String receiptsModifiersTable() {
329    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers (\n" +
330           "    uid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
331           "    participant VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
332           "    participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
333           "    operation VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
334           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
335           "    currency VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
336           "    modifier DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
337           "    PRIMARY KEY(uid, participant)\n" +
338           ");";
339  }
340
341  @Override
342  public @Language("SQL") String accountPurge(final int days) {
343
344    final String acc = prefix + "accounts";
345    final String players = prefix + "players_accounts";
346
347    return "DELETE FROM " + acc +
348           "WHERE uid IN (" +
349           "  SELECT uid FROM " + players +
350           "  WHERE EXISTS (" +
351           "    SELECT *" +
352           "    FROM " + acc +
353           "    WHERE " + acc + ".uid = " + players + ".uid" +
354           "    AND DATEDIFF(DAY, " + players + ".last_online, NOW()) >= " + days +
355           "  )" +
356           ");";
357  }
358
359  @Override
360  public @Language("SQL") String receiptPurge(final int days) {
361
362    return "DELETE FROM " + prefix + "receipts WHERE archived = false" +
363           "AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), performed) >= " + days;
364  }
365
366  @Override
367  public @Language("SQL") String saveName() {
368
369    return saveName;
370  }
371
372  @Override
373  public @Language("SQL") String loadAccounts() {
374
375    return loadAccounts;
376  }

380
381    return loadAccount;
382  }

385  public @Language("SQL") String saveAccount() {
386
387    return saveAccount;
388  }

392
393    return loadNonPlayer;

399    return saveNonPlayer;
400  }

484  }
485
486  @Override
487  public String parseVersion(final String version) {
488
489    return version.split("-")[1];
490  }
491
492  @Override
493  public String requirement() {
494
495    return requirement;
496  }
497}
